name: The Darkness Is Coming
description:
You are the guardian of the last source of light in your world. Your duty is to protect the light at all costs.

___CONTROLS___

WASD= movement

Left mouse button= Spin/Dash attack

Right mouse button= Side/Slash attack

Space= Light Grenade (hold space to aim and release)

Number 1= Light Grenade upgrade   (bigger grenade radius)

Number 2= Spin/Dash upgrade   (faster dashing)

Number 3= Side/Slash upgrade   (higher slash damage)

___HOW TO PLAY___

Keep the shadows away from the source of light using your skills. Every wave is harder so be prepared. Buy upgrades for your skills with credits displayed in the top right corner of the screen (pressing the numbers 1, 2 or 3 depending on which upgrade you want to buy). Defend the light for as long as you can. Good luck guardian!

Made for "Finally Finish Something 2021" game jam

Code, Art, Music and Sound Effects : Me
